article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Spokane
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Spokane.
article.content:
​​

The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small- to medium-sized companies with their exporting strategies. Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists located in the Spokane U.S. Export Assistance Center serve this highly diverse and multi-cultural business community! These arethe Washington State countiesthe Spokane USEAC serves.

The Spokane Export Assistance Center is part of an international network consisting of 105 U.S. Export Assistance Centers across the country and 165 offices in 82 countries. Our domestic and international offices are directly linked through a worldwide communications and information network which offers a unique and valuable service to U.S. exporters. For more information on how we can help your company with its exporting strategies, please visit Our Services.

Upcoming Events:

Medical Technologies Trade Mission to Turkey

We are pleased to announce the upcoming U.S. Department of Commerce's executive led Medical Technologies Trade Mission to Ankara, Izmir and Istanbul, Turkey, from May 4th to May 8th, 2014.

Please visit our website to learn more:

http://export.gov/trademissions/turkeyhealthcare2014

Featured Webinar:

Is your company reaching its full potential in the Canadian market? The U.S. Commercial Service is coordinating a four-part webinar series in October and November to address commonly asked questions from U.S. exporters regarding NAFTA, duties, HST/GST, temporarily moving goods a people across the border, and promoting products in Canada using social media and other online tools.

Pleaseclick herefor details.

If you have difficulty with the link, copy and paste the following link into your browser: http://export.gov/washington/spokane/tradeeventsspokane/eg_us_wa_065581​.
